title: Would Ardent Censer really be OP if the caster could buff themselves with the 15% As / 30 Dmg ?
body: Title pretty much says it all. I'm mean Zeke's gives the support 50% crit and increase in AP as well as the adc. Whats the fear in letting a Janna or a Karma get some attack speed for shielding herself.?

replies.body: Then it starts being used by Kayle or Teemo in other lanes. Which is the only problem I can see it about it.

The reason that it doesn't buff the caster is for champions like Kayle and Nidalee, as mentioned by WhiskerWow. That isn't to say it would necessarily be OP, but that is the current reasoning. As someone that plays or played both of these champions quite regularly, I actually really wanted it to apply to caster, but that's not the route we went with it.

If we wanted to make Ardent Censer stronger, I think we would prefer to just make the current effect stronger.

Have you guys ever considered changing the aspd and magic damage amount to a flat amount +PLUS+ a percentage of shield/heal amount? I personally feel like it's just a wasted slot. The movement speed is nice, but that's it. That's all that makes it a good item, which isn't enough. The aspd and magic damage falls off extremely hard mid to late game that it's just taking up a slot that could be better used with any other item.

I mean, if you make it strong (10-20%), I pick it up on Shen and give my ADC 100-200 damage on-hit + 100% attackspeed with my ult, while anyone else gets reasonable damage and atkspeed. If you make it weak to accommodate for edge cases like Shen with 1 AP item, then Janna/Alistar/Lulu don't get... well... anything from it.

It seems like it could also be a mechanical difficulty- what does a Janna give on her ult? Does it give damage/atkspd based on each tick of healing? Does it get larger as each tick stacks up? Does it give the whole amount even if Janna just starts the channel and then immediately cancels? I could see 2 making the most sense, but 1 or 3 seem like the easiest to implement and the most clear (damage starting low and stacking up would be... awkward, at best).

But yeah, if they were to make it % of shield/heal amount, I'm taking AP Shen wherever and giving tons of damage to my ADC (Or just a random ranged champion. With that kind of stat you don't need to have built for it. It'd probably work better on a mage anyways, with their magic pen. Esp. an autoattacking mage/ap carry).
I really like the idea of the bonus scaling. Not sure how to do it best though.
Make it scale with level?

Would solo laners like Kayle and Lulu using it actually be BAD though? They basically choose Utility over Damage unless they can Heal/Shield themselves. {{item:3504}} only lasts 6 seconds too and only after they use a Shield/Heal. Would be really interesting to see it being used as a solo laner item to increase the utility of a team.
6 seconds is a team fight
{{item:3504}} needs to scale better, that's it. Just give it scaling attack speed and damage (maybe add an AP ratio on the damage bonus?) And it'll be worth keeping.
